entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:28 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:28 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:28 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023
